name: Cross Road+-Check Run
description:
This is a lost chick, the first thing it needs to do is going back home, and you should help it crossy road to go home safety. There are a lot of traffic on the way home, chick will be squished if you inattentive, so you much take care to cross the road.

[How To Play Crossy Road]

Swipe left or right of the screen to jump left or right.Swipe forward or tap screen to move forward.

Heads up:you must be carefully,too many cars on the road , accidentally crushed.

Chicks need to move forward quickly , otherwise , it will be starved to death on the road.
